jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Mobility marketplace is the team that manages, improves, and owns Gojek's liquidity across the marketplace (2W & 4W). We are a specialized team tasked with balancing across customers, drivers, and Gojek objectives. It’s ranging from pricing, driver incentives, demand generation, and the core allocation which is match-making between customers and drivers. Business Intelligence team help them achieving their goals by creating the products, so they can make the decision based on data.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Working closely with new projects, ops, marketing, consumer apps & business development
  • To handle Allocation core stream on maintaining reliability and balance demand vs supply across location and hour of day, and in charge for experimentation
  • Deliver insight, analysis using statistical tools, data visualisation and business use case to product and business team
  • Perform analysis in relation with determining new project pilot settings, customer & driver support units, user behavior, user acquisition & retention, in-app behavior
  • Building & maintaining dashboards for tracking OKR
  • Related ad-hoc tasks

• 2-4 years of working experience with strong geolocation analysis capability, basic statistics and Machine Learning (forecasting, clustering, and statistical significance test). Also have strong business sense and data driven
  • Expert in SQL and strong experience with a data visualization and dashboarding tool (e.g. Tableau, Metabase, etc)
  • Good knowledge of Pentaho/Shell Scripting/other ETL tools and also R or Python
  • Excellent communication and leadership, goal oriented, and good ability to work in a team, creative thinking, and collaborative
